title: Why are my skin prices higher on this account than usual?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So I was excited to see the SnowDown skins and went to check my main act, a bit happy for some skins... but this changed when I looked at my other act, (which is lvl 7), that I am planning to rank up soon. On this other act, i noticed that the original prices for most of the skins there were higher than usual, (1950rp for blood moon yas, 2230rp for jax). Now, my question is that are these skin prices are capped this way just because I am a lower level, or is it something else? Its hard to explain this on my part, as I am confused too...

replies.body: It's because that account doesn't own those champions yet, so the price is including the price of the champion as well! Wouldn't feel too good to give discounts on skins you can't use at all, so we put a discount in your discount ^_^
Looks like you might not own the champions for some of those skins - if you don't own the champion for a skin the price will be a discounted price on **both** the champion *and* the skin!
thank you soo much for clarifying, now I am going to question my self on my thought process :thinking:

Note: The skin price in the shop for the yas skin is 950, but the discount price in the gyazo screenshot above shows that its 50% off, yet the price of that discounted skin is 974rp https://gyazo.com/2c3a2fa982cfc81f33671ec422f1323b
